goal.ch: 本課程著重於聽力與口說的訓練。期望修課學生能用基本生詞和語法自我介紹，並能中文進行基本的日常對話。
goal.en: The course focuses on the training of listening and speaking. Capable of communicating with basic vocabularies and grammar, making a self-introduction and carrying on basic conversations in their daily live.

outline.ch: 本課程使用《時代華語一》此一教材。希望學生透過此課程培養基本的聽說能力，能聽懂日常基本對話，並能用相對自然的中文與台灣人溝通。此課程也會教授學生漢字的基本結構與筆劃，使學生能書寫基本的漢字。最後，也希望學生能透過此課程更加了解台灣的文化。
outline.en: The course uses the textbook “Modern Chinese I” to help students develop proficient language skills in listening and speaking that would enable them to understand and authentically communicate with Taiwanese people. Furthermore, this course also helps students to learn the structures and stroke orders of Chinese characters and be able to write. Through this course, students will wilder understand Taiwanese culture.

textbook.ch: 《時代華語一》第一課～第四課或第五課
